Posted By: Purplerooster (1/25/2013 11:06:49 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
[Silverblade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Silverblade), [Ajani, Caller of the Pride](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ajani, Caller of the Pride), [Boros Charm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Boros Charm)...  
  
Yep, lots of ways to make this a game-ender.  
  
Honestly, if you get to the fourth turn and haven't dealt the 8 damage to make this guy lethal, you're playing the deck wrong.  
  
T1: [Vexing Devil](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vexing Devil) smashes them for four  
T2: [Boros Charm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Boros Charm), same thing  
T3: [Silverblade Paladin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Silverblade Paladin) or [Ajani, Caller of the Pride](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ajani, Caller of the Pride)  
T4: Lethal Spark Trooper.

posts.post_content:
This is scary and good!  
I like it, since I can respect that it's not quite "overpowered" (it IS super powerful, it can net a difference of 12 life in a single attack for 4cmc only), but still balanced enough to not make it frustrating (yeah, first strike and a simple ping does it for this guy)  
4.5/5 for being quite balanced

posts.post_content:
At first glance, I considered [Silverblade Paladin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Silverblade Paladin) and thought this [Spark Trooper](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Spark Trooper) would be amazing. But then I realized [Blind Obedience](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blind Obedience) was printed in the exact same set... and this card went from awesome to not so good.  
  
Not to mention this set is very first strike heavy. It's kind of sad when you realize your entire double strike goodness plan is cut in half by something as simple as an [Aerial Maneuver](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Aerial Maneuver), or a [Warclamp Mastiff](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Warclamp Mastiff).
posts.html:
At first glance, I considered Silverblade Paladin and thought this Spark Trooper would be amazing. But then I realized Blind Obedience was printed in the exact same set... and this card went from awesome to not so good.

Not to mention this set is very first strike heavy. It's kind of sad when you realize your entire double strike goodness plan is cut in half by something as simple as an Aerial Maneuver, or a Warclamp Mastiff.

posts.post_content:
Here is a neat 1 hit kill combo if your opponent decides not to block your [Spark Trooper](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Spark Trooper)  
  
 [Spark Trooper](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Spark Trooper )  +  [Inquisitor's Flail](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Inquisitor's Flail )  +  [Boros Charm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Boros Charm )  or a soul binded  [Silverblade Paladin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Silverblade Paladin )  after blocker are assign and before combat damage is dealt = a very scary suicidal trooper
posts.html:
Here is a neat 1 hit kill combo if your opponent decides not to block your Spark Trooper

Spark Trooper + Inquisitor's Flail + Boros Charm or a soul binded Silverblade Paladin after blocker are assign and before combat damage is dealt = a very scary suicidal trooper
